name: AuthenticYogi
0:
”Alexa, Open Authentic Yogi”
”Alexa, Start Vinyasa with Authentic Yogi”
”Alexa, Start Authentic Yogi”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: authentic yogi
des:
Authentic Yogi offers free, studio quality Vinyasa Yoga sessions in the comfort of your home.

This skill is suitable for yoga practitioners who have a fundamental understanding of yoga poses and Vinyasa yoga. Our sessions are guided by voice cues, much like in a real world Yoga studio. We strive to provide high quality, uniquely designed Vinyasa Yoga sequences that you can practice anytime, anywhere with an Alexa enabled device.

We all have those days when life takes over and we can’t make time to get to a studio. With this skill, we have you covered! Just roll out your mat in a place of your choice and say ‘Alexa, Open Authentic Yogi’. 

Our early users have found that they are able to bring their focus inwards much more easily when practicing in a safe space of their choice with minimum external distractions. 

While this is our first release, we are committed to building a robust repository of sessions to cater to the needs of yogis at all levels. We would love to hear any feedback/ comments from you, write to us at contact[AT]authenticyogi.com

If you are new to yoga, we recommend you take a real world class (or free/premium videos/apps) and use this skill to supplement your practice. 

Go ahead and get started by saying : Alexa, Open Authentic Yogi. 

Thanks for sharing your practice with us. Namaste !

You can learn more about the skill at: https://authenticyogi.com/alexa-skill/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
